newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish NBP fixes zloty up vs dlr at 2.8105.
newsitem.headline: Polish NBP fixes zloty up vs dlr at 2.8105.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland fixed the zloty at 2.8105 against the dollar, up from 2.8160 yesterday and at 1.8655 against the mark, down from 1.8535, the NBP said.
